MajorClaims.MC1: it is very important to live life at a slower pace
MajorClaims.MC2: living a slower life is advantageous for your health, your happiness and even the quality of your work

Claims.C1: living in a hurry comes along with several disadvantages
Claims.C2: living your life on the fast lane is very stressful and can affect your health
Claims.C3: living your life at a slower pace increases your happiness
Claims.C4: you might make mistakes, you would not have done with more patience

Premises.P3: their bodies cannot hold the pace
